Taglines:From zero to hero

Storyline : Stanley Ipkiss is a bank clerk that is an incredibly nice man. Unfortunately, 
he is too nice for his own good and is a pushover when it comes to confrontations. After 
one of the worst days of his life, he finds a mask that depicts Loki, the Norse night god 
of mischief. Now, when he puts it on, he becomes his inner, self: a cartoony romantic wild 
man. However, a small time crime boss, Dorian Tyrel, comes across this character dubbed 
"The Mask" by the media. After Ipkiss's alter ego indirectly kills his friend in crime, 
Tyrel now wants this green-faced goon destroyed.
